snippet.title: Altitude Geometric Mean Theorem
snippet.description:
Learn how to use the Altitude Geometric Mean Theorem in this free math video tutorial by Mario's Math Tutoring.

0:09 What is the Geometric Mean
1:08 Using Similar Triangles to Show Why the Altitude Geometric Mean Theorem Works
1:49 Example 1 Solving for the Altitude
2:17 Example 2 Solving for a Portion of the Hypotenuse
2:54 Example 3 
3:26 Further Exploration of How to Compare the 3 Similar Triangles Formed When an Altitude is Drawn from the Right Angle to the Hypotenuse

Related Videos:

Leg Geometric Mean Theorem
https://youtu.be/e15GF1af6VA
